SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http

Class HTTPAuthenticationProvider.AuthenticationResult

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http.HTTPAuthenticationProvider.AuthenticationResult
Enclosing class:
HTTPAuthenticationProvider
public static class HTTPAuthenticationProvider.AuthenticationResult extends Object
Authentication result containing outcome and principal information.

This class encapsulates the result of an authentication attempt, including whether it succeeded, the authenticated user's information, and any error message for failed attempts.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    errorMessage
    Error message if authentication failed, null otherwise.
    final String
    realm
    The realm name used for authentication.
    final String
    scheme
    The authentication scheme used (e.g., "Basic", "Digest", "Bearer").
    final boolean
    success
    Whether the authentication was successful.
    final String
    username
    The authenticated username, or null if authentication failed.

    • failure

      public static HTTPAuthenticationProvider.AuthenticationResult failure(String scheme, String realm, String errorMessage)
      Creates a failed authentication result with specific scheme and realm details.
      Parameters:
      scheme - the authentication scheme that was attempted
      realm - the realm name
      errorMessage - the reason for authentication failure
      Returns:
      a failed authentication result
